entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers except flurries at times heavy over mountainous terrain. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
